content.question: The disparities of wealth mentioned by Parkinson in the passage are best explained in the context of the

choices.label: lower prices for consumer goods made possible by industrialization
higher wages available for industrial work as compared to agricultural work
high profits and low wages associated with manufacturing industries in the nineteenth century
failure of urban governments to create infrastructure and public health services in rapidly growing cities

content.answer: high profits and low wages associated with manufacturing industries in the nineteenth century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
